SELECT e.id , t.title_name AS titleName, e.applicant AS applicantId, uu. NAME AS applyer, e.auditor AS auditorId, u. NAME AS author, CASE WHEN e.status='1' THEN '未审核' WHEN e.status='2'THEN '审核通过' ELSE '审核未通过' END flag FROM title_examine e JOIN title t ON e.title_id = t.id JOIN t_user u ON u.id = e.auditor AND u.id = e.auditor JOIN t_user uu ON uu.id = e.applicant WHERE 1=1
AND e.status = #{status}
AND t.title_name like CONCAT('%',#{titleName},'%')
AND uu.NAME like CONCAT('%',#{applyer},'%')

SELECT b.title_name AS title_name, title_type AS title_type, title_source AS title_source, suitMajorName AS suitMajorName, suitScope AS suitScope, c. NAME AS NAME, a.id as id, CASE when a.status='1' THEN '未审核' WHEN a.status='2'THEN '审核通过' ELSE '审核未通过' END status FROM title_examine a JOIN title b ON a.title_id = b.id JOIN t_user c ON a.auditor = c.id WHERE 1=1
AND c.name like CONCAT('%',#{author},'%')
AND b.title_name like CONCAT('%',#{titlename},'%')

SELECT t.id, t.title_name titleName, t.title_type titleType, t.title_source titleSource, t.suitMajorName, t.suitScope, t.limit_person limitPerson, t.meaning_target meaningTarget, t.condition_work conditionWork, CASE when t.flag='1' THEN '待审核' WHEN t.flag='2'THEN '审核通过' ELSE '审核未通过' END flag FROM title t JOIN ( SELECT id,name FROM t_user WHERE major = ( SELECT u.major FROM t_user u WHERE u.id = #{userId})) tmp ON t.author = tmp.id and t.flag=1
AND tmp.name like CONCAT('%',#{author},'%')
AND t.title_name like CONCAT('%',#{titlename},'%')
SELECT id FROM t_user WHERE major = ( SELECT u.major FROM t_user u WHERE u.id = #{userId})) tmp ON t.author = tmp.id
and t.flag=#{flag}
